attributes.action: Remove British Passports for any Citizen joining foriegn Jihad
attributes.additional_details:
It is known that a large number of British citizens have travelled aboard to participate in 'Jihad', for example in the Middle East in Syria and Iraq, and in Nigeria with Boko Haram.

British Passports should be removed from any citizen who is known to have travelled to the Middle East to participate in religious 'Jihad' in the name of Islam. Passports should also be removed from any citizen who is known to have travelled to overseas terrorist training camps. These people should under no circumstances be allowed back into the UK if they are known to have travelled aboard to participate in any actions linked to Terrorism. If they are back in the UK already they should be arrested, deported, and have any right to British citizenship removed, whether they were born in the UK or not.
